thread.section_title: LeaversHoodies.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.leavershoodies.com
thread.title: Belinda

author: Belinda
title: Belinda
text: LeaversHoodies catered to every request I made, even when I was being a bit complicated. My account manager Anna responded very quickly each time and she made it easy to make alterations to my order at any point before payment. We have just received our hoodies and everyone is thoroughly pleased with them. Also, by using the early bird offer they have been extremely good value for money. I would recommend them to any school or group that want hoodies!
